rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with east-west orientation for optimal sunlight and Vastu compliance. Incorporates Brutalist aesthetics with raw concrete finishes.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room. Designed with an open layout that flows into the courtyard and features exposed concrete pillars.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-equipped kitchen with island counter, designed to be functional in a split-level plan. Incorporates Vastu principles by facing north.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom integrated with the living area for easy access and privacy, featuring minimalistic Brutalist design elements.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master suite on the ground floor with a walk-in closet and a private en-suite bathroom. Faces east to capture morning sunlight as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Connected to the master bedroom; designed with a spa-like ambiance and concrete finishes for Brutalist appeal.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A key element of the villa providing natural light and ventilation. Features a reflective water feature and concrete seating area.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A grand entrance with reinforced concrete steps leading to the central courtyard. Designed to ensure a smooth transition from the exterior and adherence to Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Service Entrances
openings.description: Separate entrances for servants' quarters, strategically placed on the west side of the villa in line with local norms.

openings.name: Swimming Pool Entrance
openings.description: An outdoor pool area that opens into a dedicated swimming pool zone. The design includes a retractable cover for the Brutalist style aesthetic.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom with natural light and exposed concrete detailing, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Bathroom for the guest bedroom area, featuring concrete finishes and functional design in a split-level configuration.

rooms.name: Service Quarters Bedrooms
rooms.description: Multiple small bedrooms for servants with basic amenities, ensuring comfort and adherence to local building norms.

openings.name: Upper Level Staircase
openings.description: Stairs connecting the ground floor to the upper level designed with Brutalist style and integrated into the wall structure.

openings.name: Service Quarters Entrance
openings.description: Dedicated entrance for servant quarters, ensuring privacy while complying with Vastu principles by facing east.
